page.title: 14Houses
page.content: The most populated areas are the villages of Meliden and Dyserth. Dyserth has a mixture of private and council housing estates close to the B5332 and B5119,at the base of Moel Hiraddug.Private Estates are found at Bron Deg,Parc Gwelfor and Glanffyddion.There are few flats or Terraced houses,the rest of the area being a mixture of houses and bungalows.Two council estates of semi detached houses are found at Maes Hiraddug and Maes Glas.Lower Dyserth has its own Old Peoples Community Centre surrounded by bungalows. In Meliden,the largest housing development is the council estate of semi detached houses in Ffordd Pennant,Ffordd Talargoch and Ffordd Ty Newydd close to the A525 and at the base of Graig Fawr.
